definition.procedurexml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="percent" type="Number">percent</variable><variable id="seconds" type="Number">seconds</variable><variable id="default_time_chance" type="Number">default_time_chance</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="18" y="29"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems_oredictionary"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="b"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">better_tools:flaming_armor</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:percent</field><value name="VAL"><block inline="false" type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="get_attribute_whole"><field name="attribute">CUSTOM:FireThornsChance</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:seconds</field><value name="VAL"><block type="get_attribute_whole"><field name="attribute">CUSTOM:FireThornsTime</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><comment h="75" pinned="false" w="355">set the value which appears for chance AND time, when no armor pieces are worn.
Time in seconds and chance as percent happen to be the same, when none are worn.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_dimensionids"><value name="a"><block type="entity_dimension_id"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="get_dimensionid"><field name="dimension">Nether</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:default_time_chance</field><value name="TEXT">better_tools:nether_diamond_upgraded_crystallite_items</field></block></value></block></value><value name="THEN"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value><value name="ELSE"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block
